data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Stanislav Vasilev waits before resuming play because Mario Fernandes for CSKA Moscow is still down.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Mario Fernandes is back on the pitch.
In the minute 5, Stanislav Vasilev signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
CSKA Moscow are coming forward and Nayair Tiknizyan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 10, Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Fedor Chalov's header is off-target for CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 12, Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Nikola Vlasic for CSKA Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 27, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 28, In Ekaterinburg CSKA Moscow attack through Fedor Chalov. The finish is off target, however.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 31, Ural Yekaterinburg's Roman Emeljanov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 33, Othman El Kabir of Ural Yekaterinburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
In the minute 38, Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
In the minute 40, Stanislav Vasilev signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
Roman Emeljanov (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a yellow card from Stanislav Vasilev.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Ekaterinburg.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Central Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 47, Play has been interrupted briefly in Ekaterinburg to check on Baktiyor Zaynutdinov, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
He's off! Hordur Magnusson is shown a red card.
In the minute 50, Ural Yekaterinburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg drive upfield and Othman El Kabir gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a CSKA Moscow defender.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Branko Jovicic breaks free at Central Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 51, Stanislav Vasilev awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Baktiyor Zaynutdinov for CSKA Moscow is back on the field again.
Goal! Baktiyor Zaynutdinov gives CSKA Moscow a 0-1 lead in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 53, The away team have replaced Fedor Chalov with Viktor Vasin. This is the first substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 56, CSKA Moscow's Konstantin Maradishvili is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! CSKA Moscow extend their lead to 0-2 through Konstantin Maradishvili.
That's a fine assist from Nikola Vlasic.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to CSKA Moscow's area.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
CSKA Moscow needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Central Stadium.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In the minute 63, Aleksey Evseev is replacing Roman Emeljanov for the home team.
In the minute 64, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
CSKA Moscow are pushing forward but Ivan Oblyakov's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 65, Stanislav Vasilev awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 68, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 72, Ural Yekaterinburg push forward at Central Stadium and Branko Jovicic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined CSKA Moscow defence.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ivan Oblyakov (CSKA Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 73, Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside CSKA Moscow's half?
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at Central Stadium.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
At Central Stadium, Konstantin Maradishvili has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 80, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg just outside CSKA Moscow's area.
Nayair Tiknizyan for CSKA Moscow has been booked by Stanislav Vasilev and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Kalinin is booked for the home team.
The match at Central Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Nikola Vlasic, who is down injured.
CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vladimir Rykov for Ural Yekaterinburg drives towards goal at Central Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at Central Stadium.
The away team has substituted Nikola Vlasic with Arnor Sigurdsson. Viktor Goncharenko is thus making his second change.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Andrey Panyukov for Ural Yekaterinburg is whistled offside.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Ekaterinburg.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Central Stadium.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
That's full-time at Central Stadium. The final score is 0-2.
CSKA Moscow make their third substitution with Alan Dzagoev replacing Nayair Tiknizyan.
Chidera Ejuke is replacing Konstantin Kuchaev for CSKA Moscow at Central Stadium.
Artem Shabolin is on a sub for Andrey Egorychev for Ural Yekaterinburg.
